scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build: cd packages/miniprogram-element && npm run build && cd ../miniprogram-render && npm run build && cd ../kbone-ui && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.test: npm run build && cd packages/vue-improve-loader && npm run test && cd ../miniprogram-render && npm run test && cd ../miniprogram-element && npm run test && cd ../kbone-tool && npm run test && cd ../..
